availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George R. Fearons (Campbell County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Newport, Kentucky, attorney. Native of Ireland. Married to Jane Fearons. Father of George H. Fearons, Charles E. Fearons, Mary K. Fearons, Henry S. Fearons, and Oscar A. Fearons. Tailor in Newport in 1850. Attorney in Newport in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 48A. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 239. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 28. Find A Grave, "George R. Fearons (1819-1899)," Memorial #135789111, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/135789111/george-r.-fearons (accessed November 27, 2017). KYR-0001-029-0592.
